# expenses_tracker_flutter_app

A simple Expenses Tracker app using flutter.

## preview

[![Watch the Video](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/33179999/294648320-34369070-9bda-425a-aac9-a61d0976dbdd.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..pRZpF0VDHQKRN0kc-YABBfajnB7dRRMagpotre2Igjw)](https://vimeo.com/900315471?share=copy)

## about the lesson

https://www.udemy.com/course/learn-flutter-dart-to-build-ios-android-apps/learn/lecture/37143046#overview

## how to run

1. install dependencies

   flutter pub get

2. choose device

   ctrl + shift + p

   > Flutter: Select Device

3. run the app

   on tab bar : run > start debugging or press F5
